name: NLP
body:
This project is to provide tools to achieve intelligence in language processing 

### APIs
#### Lexicon 
***

com.dexter.nlp.script.Lexicon - Generate lexicons from distinct subtitle (srt) files from the given dir after lemmatized, removing unusual, filtering stop words, filtering unwanted part-of-speech tags, and filtering basic words

#### TVSubtitles 
***

com.dexter.nlp.util.TVSubtitles - Downloads TV Show subtitles from tvsubtitles.com

#### Words 
***

com.dexter.nlp.util.Words - Finds frequency distribution of words

#### Authors and Contributors
Bala
#### Support
https://github.com/balak1986
#### Contact
dexter_darkpassenger@ymail.com
